app_desc.message: The most advanced Speed Dial in the world for your bookmarks! This will improve your productivity!

welcome_watch_video.message: Watch a short introduction video (1:50) to see the main features.

welcome_home_group.message: Current "Home group" has 4 x 3 dials, you can change it here:

welcome_import_josep_del_rio.message: there is an import feature from "Speed Dial by Josep del Rio" and others in the options:

welcome_pick_color.message: Pick a color theme you want to use:

welcome_visuals.message: For more options visit the Options page

replace_duplicate_dial.message: Duplicate dial - click to update thumbnail

msg_pro_cloud_upload.message: Uploading thumbnails to the cloud - this allows you to see them in the

msg_pro_cloud_web_desc.message: Cloud version is currently not editable but it works in every browser - even in your phone!

msg_pro_same_thumbnails.message: Now you can have same thumbnails on every device!

msg_pro_thumbnails_download.message: This will download all your uploaded thumbnails from the cloud and replace your current local.

msg_correct_account.message: Please visit the cloud server and make sure you are logged in a correct account:

msg_replace_text.message: Alternatively you can replace your local dials.

msg_search_tip.message: Tip: add notes to dials for better search

msg_add_dial_text.message: You can also navigate between groups, move or remove existing dials.

add_target_dial.message: Select target empty dial for page:

add_target_dials.message: Create new empty group or select $1 dials

sync_err_wrong_account.message: Your version belongs to a different account.

sync_err_forbidden.message: You don't have access to this resource

use_image_as_thumbnail.message: Use this image as dial thumbnail

privacy_info_head.message: This add-on allows you to backup and synchronize your dials using Cloud server at $1

privacy_info_body_1.message: If you create a cloud account there, your dials will be synchronized with this server. These data contains only basic information (entered by you) about your dials - such as name, URL, etc... There are NO tracking data nor statistics!

privacy_info_body_2.message: Without cloud account, this add-on will NOT make any requests to any server. If you enable downloading of Favicons from Google service (in Options page), requests will be made to Google server to download Favicons. Usage of optional cloud related features (like thumbnails from public library) will also produce requests to the Cloud server. These requests will NOT contain any private information.

field_columns_range.message: Columns number must be between $1 and $2

field_rows_range.message: Rows number must be between $1 and $2

field_position_range.message: Position among groups must be between $1 and $2

field_ratio_x_range.message: Ratio X has to be between $1 and $2

field_ratio_y_range.message: Ratio Y has to be between $1 and $2

validation_small_group_dimensions.message: This group already contains $1 dials. Please use more rows or columns so that they fit.

group_delete_body.message: Are you sure you want to delete group and all its dials?

cm_open_all_new.message: Open all dials - in new tabs

cm_replace_existing_title.message: Replace existing tabs with dials from this group.

cm_plus_delay_title.message: Wait $1 seconds after page loads before taking screenshot

sync_download_cloud_question.message: Are you sure you want to download your thumbnails from cloud?

sync_download_cloud_question_2.message: This will replace your current local thumbnails.

sync_conflict_body.message: There is a newer version on Cloud server but you have some unsaved local changes.

sync_conflict_body_2.message: Do you want to replace your local version?

sync_err_account_title.message: Your data version is associated with a different account

sync_not_empty_title.message: There are already some dials in the cloud

sync_changed_account_body.message: You are now logged in to a different account.

history_revert_dials.message: If you want to revert your dials back, use the $1 feature.

unexpected_solution.message: Click here to reload add-on (if it won't help, try to restart your browser or PC).

unexpected_body.message: Please send me the following error log to my support e-mail:

err_mutable_title.message: Error loading database due to disabled History in your browser.

err_mutable_body.message: You need to set "Remember history" in Firefox / Options / Privacy & Security / History.

login_login_title.message: Login to enable cloud synchronization and access to cloud-dials

menu_refresh_all.message: Refresh all in group / all missing (after synchronization) / all group dials

menu_history_title.message: Opens window where you can manage your history/backups

menu_pro_upload.message: Pro versions only - Uploads all thumbnails to the cloud and makes them available in Cloud-dials web page (even in your phone!)

menu_pro_download.message: Pro versions only - Downloads all thumbnails from the cloud replacing current local.

ed_live_dial_title_1.message: Live dials are live web-pages loaded directly into a dial.

ed_live_dial_title_2.message: Not every web-page can be loaded into live dial, but most pages will work.

search_provider_url_info.message: See this video tutorial on how to create search URL

search_add_more_title.message: You can have multiple search inputs in single dial.

search_provider_tip.message: Press "Enter" to search here or "Ctrl + Enter" to open search in New tab

multi_dial_import_help_1.message: If you want to name a link, place the name on the line above the link and prefix it with "$1" character.

dial_click_to_clipboard.message: Copy text to clipboard on dial click

ar_dial_delay_title.message: After page is loaded, we will wait before creating a thumbnail. This can help if page loads its content over time or if it contains complex graphics.

ed_more_advanced.message: More advanced options will come in future versions.

ed_blank_radio.message: Blank / solid color thumbnail - by using Background color

ed_make_text_radio.message: Create your own Text Thumbnail using web-page $1:

load_images_empty.message: No images found for this domain

public_upload_consent.message: By uploading thumbnail to public library, you agree with:

public_upload_body_1.message: Thumbnail uploaded to public library will be available to all users!

public_upload_body_2.message: Uploaded data contains - thumbnail image, thumbnail position, dial name. Other users won't see who uploaded the thumbnail.

ed_vr_resolution_title.message: Resolution of the page during thumbnail creation.

ds_fetch_new_name.message: Update dial title during reload (requires JavaScript)

ds_fetch_new_name_title.message: During the reload (or auto-reload), dials title will be changed to current page title. For this to work, JavaScript needs to be enabled.

ds_no_script_title.message: Disabling JavaScript can help with thumbnail generation for some pages.

menu_search_title.message: Search for dial (Ctrl + Shift + F) - using URL / Name / Note

dial_number_title.message: Dial number - this can be used with "Ctrl + Number for Group Speed Dial" add-on to open this dial with keyboard shortcut.

dial_note_placeholder.message: notes helps you find dials through search feature (Ctrl + Shift + F)

dial_url_placeholder.message: you can omit prefix http://    (example: google.com)

menu_archive_title.message: Archive contains your groups marked as Archived.

o_bing_hide_dials.message: Auto-hide dials to see the background

o_add_current_after_action.message: After adding current page to dials:

o_theme_title.message: default: black - for better sleep at night!

o_padding_title.message: Space around each dial, between two dials the value is doubled.

o_disable_dials_sync.message: Disable dials synchronization on this device

o_disable_dials_sync_title.message: Your dials will NOT be backed up to the cloud. Make sure to create local backups regularly to prevent data loss!

o_auto_options_sync.message: Automatically backup and synchronize your options with all devices

o_group_padding_title.message: Space around each group name, between two groups the value is doubled.

o_group_font_size_title.message: Size of text in the upper bar.

o_two_gradient_colors_title.message: Select at least 2 colors to use gradient. - Using complicated gradient background may slightly impact performance.

o_big_picture_warning_title.message: Using too big pictures may negatively affect performance (new tab loading time).

o_group_delayed_activation_title.message: This delay enables to choose a group even when it's surrounded by other groups (if you have like 3 lines of groups)

o_auto_upload_title.message: Professional version is required. - Auto-upload can be active only on one device.

o_no_title_title.message: When enabled, all dial names will be hidden.

o_squared_edges_title.message: When enabled, dials will have sharp corners.

o_dial_title_down_title.message: When enabled, dial name will be on the bottom.

o_no_shadow_title.message: When enabled, default shadow around dials will be hidden.

o_hide_empty_dials_title.message: When enabled, all empty dials will be hidden.

o_dial_numbers_title.message: Dial numbers will be shown next to dial name. Numbers for dials are useful when you want to use "Ctrl + Number for Group Speed Dial" add-on to open dials using keyboard shortcuts.

o_hide_hover_shadow_title.message: When enabled, on-hover shadow will be disabled.

o_hide_login_part_title.message: Hides "Login / Create account" label or your cloud name if you are logged in.

o_hide_top_bar_title.message: When enabled, groups list and login part will be hidden.

o_hide_add_group.message: Hide "+" button at the end of groups list

o_root_groups_only.message: Hide nested groups from group list (top bar)

o_root_groups_only_title.message: Only root groups will be shown. Groups that have group-dial in any group will be hidden.

o_firefox_homepage_override.message: When Firefox starts, open dials page

o_pro_thumbnail_sync.message: Enable automatic thumbnails synchronization with the cloud server

o_group_name_as_title.message: Set dials page Title as name of currently selected group

o_prevent_new_tab_container.message: Prevent opening dials page in Firefox container

o_prevent_new_tab_container_title.message: Dials page will be opened without container

o_group_name_as_title_title.message: Group name will be set as page Title - this can then be visible as a Tab name or name on the task-bar.

o_instant_popup_redirect.message: Toolbar icon - instant redirect to dials page

o_instant_popup_new_tab_title.message: New tab will be always opened next to current tab.

o_user_consent_google_favicon.message: Enable usage of Google service to get Favicons for dials (used only when favicon cannot be downloaded directly) - recommended

o_instant_popup_redirect_title.message: Click the toolbar icon to open dials page

o_disable_quick_edit.message: Disable quick edit with left click

o_disable_quick_edit_title.message: Left click on empty dial will no longer show the edit box.

o_open_always_new_window_title.message: Clicking dial will open its URL in new window

o_open_always_new_tab_title.message: Clicking dial will open its URL in new tab

o_open_always_include_group_dials_title.message: Also group-dials will be opened in new tab

o_open_always_focused_title.message: Newly opened tab will be also focused

o_remember_group_title.message: When enabled, next time you open New tab page, you will be redirected to the last visited group.

o_disable_auto_show_groups.message: Disable auto-show groups list when using Drag and Drop

o_disable_auto_show_groups_title.message: By default when you Drag and drop dials - the whole group list is visible to enable moving between all groups.

o_scroll_groups_title.message: You will be able to use your mouse wheel to scroll through groups.

o_scroll_groups_reverse_title.message: Scrolling UP will scroll to next group.

o_scroll_groups_circle_title.message: When end is reached, further scrolling will jump to the beginning (and vice-versa).

o_frame_jpeg_title.message: JPEG format consumes less memory and takes less time to draw.

o_visit_jpeg_title.message: JPEG format consumes less memory and takes less time to draw.

o_visit_jpeg_high_resolution_title.message: Thumbnail will have double resolution to improve quality.

o_current_dial_dimensions_title.message: When enabled, current dial size will be used for target resolution. When disabled, the resolution of target dial is computed based on the monitor resolution and the group rows / columns.

o_context_menu_show_groups.message: Show list of groups in context menu for fast insert

o_custom_css_placeholder.message: WARNING: For experienced users only! Wrong styles can break the visual experience.

o_reload_group_dials.message: Reload Group dials after changing background

o_android_min_dial_size.message: Minimum dial size on Android (0 - disabled):

o_safari_dials_page_hotkeys.message: Keyboard Shortcuts to open dials page:

o_redirect_url_title.message: WARNING: you can only use links for normal web-pages. Internal pages like "about:newtab" won't work! Only exception is "about:blank" / "about:home".

o_group_activation_delay.message: Activation delay when using Drag and Drop:

o_key_extended_mode.message: Enable access to more than 9 dials

o_key_extended_mode_title.message: You will be able to dial multi-digit numbers.

o_dial_only_current_group.message: Speed dial only currently opened group

o_dial_only_current_group_title.message: Example: dialing "1" will open first dial in currently opened group.

o_key_force_page_focus.message: Force focus on the page (experimental - may stop working)

o_key_force_page_focus_title.message: If address-bar is focused, we will try to focus the page instead. It will however disable "Back" button after navigation. This is experimental feature and it may stop working in new Firefox versions.

o_key_to_group_dial.message: Enable access to groups while holding key:

o_key_to_group_dial_title.message: While this key is down - you will be able to dial groups instead of dials.

o_key_disable_alt_title.message: Disables shortcuts using "Alt" key on Windows and "CMD" command key on Mac OS.

o_key_disable_shift_title.message: Disables shortcuts using "Shift" key, for example "Ctrl + Shift + 1" or "Alt + Shift + 1".

o_key_disable_f4.message: Disable "F4" short-key to open New tab

o_key_disable_f4_title.message: Pressing key "F4" will not open New tab.

o_key_f4_active_here.message: Open dials page in active tab

o_key_disable_zero_title.message: Pressing key "Ctrl + 0" (used for "Reset zoom") will no longer open dial number 10.

o_key_new_tab_title.message: Dialed dials will be opened always in new tabs.

o_key_next_to_current_title.message: Dialed dials will be opened next to current tab.

o_ar_disable_this_device_title.message: Auto-reload will be disabled in this browser.

o_ar_keep_pinned_tab.message: Keep reloading tab opened after reloading

o_ar_keep_pinned_tab_title.message: The tab used for creating thumbnails will stay opened after the reload.

o_ar_concurrent_count_title.message: Limit the number of pages loaded at the same time during creation of thumbnails. Lower value can save CPU and memory.

o_ar_auto_radio.message: Automatic - based on current monitor resolution (recommended)

o_ar_screen_resolution_help.message: Thumbnail resolution is computed from the size of the screen and target group size.

o_vr_screen_resolution.message: Virtual page resolution used when generating thumbnail.

o_vr_default_width_title.message: Width of the page used when generating thumbnail.

o_load_timeout.message: Max timeout for page to load:

o_thumbnails_delays_help.message: These delays are useful for thumbnails creation - many pages is using javascript to finish up loading of content and browser often needs few milliseconds to draw the page.

o_export_thumbnails.message: export also thumbnails - this will greatly increase export file size

o_import_firefox_bookmarks.message: Import dials from Firefox bookmarks ".json" file:

o_picture_bing_of_the_day_help.message: You can control Bing image from the main menu on the dials page.

o_cloud_backup_instead.message: You can also create a free Cloud account and your dials will be automatically backed up in the cloud. All data are transferred over encrypted HTTPS connection.

reload_subheading.message: This tab is used by Auto-reload feature and to create thumbnails in background.

archive_empty_body.message: Mark some group as archived first.

group_archive_group_title.message: Archived groups are not visible in the list of groups. You can access them through the Main menu / Archive.

productivity_mode_title.message: Automatically hide distracting dials during the working hours to help you focus.

msg_pro_header.message: This feature is available in Professional version only.

msg_pro_support.message: Please support future development of this add-on by upgrading.

send_runtime_errors.message: Click the link below to send me an e-mail with the information you can see below:

online_help_info.message: You will find here tutorials, tips and tricks, discussions and more!

o_about_like_it.message: If you like it, please rate it here:

o_about_dislike_it.message: If you don't like it, please let me know why to my e-mail. I'm implementing most of the feature-requests I receive.

o_about_support_by.message: Please consider supporting my work by

o_about_support_reply.message: I can reply only in English / Slovak

o_about_intro.message: My name is $1$ and I'm the author of $app_name$.

file_load_drop_help.message: You can drag and drop image file directly on the dial.

o_open_always_stop_opener_id.message: Open without relation / position to current tab

o_open_always_stop_opener_id_title.message: If tab is opened with relation to current tab, it's placed close to current tab, and after it's closed, opening (parent) tab is re-focused.

label_deprecated.message: This feature may stop working in the future versions of your browser
